DOC.brief_summary: measuring serum gherlin in polycystic ovary syndrome patients and compare it to healthy levels
DOC.brief_title: Serum Ghrelin in Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: two groups one healthy and other with pco measure ghrelin level in both of them to find relation between pco and ghrelin
DOC.criteria: pco women At least 12 months of infertility. Patients with polycystic ovarian syndrome according to Rotterdam criteria: Patients with hyperprolactinemia Patients with Cushing's syndrome Patients with Congenital or nonclassical adrenal hyperplasia Patients with hormone secreting tumors. Patients with hormonal treatment in the last 3 months.
